headline.title: Create a new project
headline.description: Make sure you read the Comunity Guidelines before you create a new project.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.description: Help us display your project correctly.

projectType.label: Select project type:

array.name: Design
array.label: The project would be available to anyone who has the link

array.name: Service
array.label: Only member of this project would be able to acces

array.name: Product
array.label: You are the only one able to access this project

projectType.hint: Refer to the standards we want to follow for this field

projectName.label: Project name:
projectName.hint: Working name of the project module

projectDescription.label: Short but concise description of this asset:
projectDescription.placeholder: E.g. An open source laser cutter within you reach
projectDescription.hint: Short description to be displayed inside the project page

repositoryOrId.label: Repository link or Interfacer ID:
repositoryOrId.hint: Reference to repository in which the technical documentation is developed

projectTags.label: Tags:
projectTags.hint: press space or return to add tags
projectTags.placeholder: E.g. laser cutter, open source, 3d printing

name.label: Location name:
name.hint: Short name to refers to the location

address.label: Address:
address.hint: Short description to be displayed inside the project page

price.label: Value in Fab Token:
price.hint: Short description to be displayed inside the project page
